headline: Wellness Tourism Market Set to Soar: From $1.00 Trillion in 2024 to $1.68 Trillion by 2033
summary: The global wellness tourism market is set to expand from USD 1.00 trillion in 2024 to USD 1.68 trillion by 2033, growing at a 5.61% CAGR. Driven by rising health consciousness, stress escapism, and increasing wellness amenities in hospitality, North America dominates the market. Key players include Accor, Hilton, and Marriott.
